heading: Today
text: A few snow showers in the north and mountains ending.  Periods of morning clouds from the Adirondacks and Rt. 2 north, and the southern mountains, giving way to more afternoon sun. Becoming mostly sunny in southern valleys.  Highs in the 20s to low 30s.  West winds near 10 mph, gusting 20 to 30 mph this morning, decreasing through the afternoon.

heading: Tonight
text: Some evening clouds north, then mostly clear, mixing with some clouds west and north late.  Lows in the single numbers to low teens, some cold spots northeast 0 to 5 below.  West winds near 10 mph, diminishing to light and variable.

heading: Friday
text: Mostly sunny south, mixing with clouds through NY, and from Rt. 2 north.  Highs in the 30s, some warmer valleys south near 40.  Winds light, becoming south near 10 mph, gusting to 25 mph in the afternoon west of the Green Mountains.
